name: badger
title: Badger
description: Show macOS Dock badges in the menu bar.
author: robbiehobby

commands.name: add
commands.title: Add Badge
commands.description: Add a new application badge to the menu bar.

commands.name: badges
commands.title: Menu Bar Badges
commands.description: Show the configured application badges in the menu bar.

commands.name: search
commands.title: Search Badges
commands.description: Search for and manage application badges displayed in the menu bar.

preferences.name: showTotal
preferences.label: Show the total count
preferences.description: When one or more applications have badges, the total is displayed next to the menu bar icon.

preferences.name: defaultColor
preferences.title: Icon Color
preferences.description: Choose the color of the menu bar icon when no applications have badges.

preferences.name: activeColor
preferences.title: Active Icon Color
preferences.description: Choose the color of the menu bar icon when one or more applications have badges.
